name: Amazon Product & BSR Tracker
description: Real-time Amazon product data via mobile proxy: price, BSR rankings, reviews, buy box analysis. Supports US, UK, DE, FR, ES, IT, CA, JP, AU marketplaces.
longDescription: Extract Amazon product intelligence at micropayment prices. Get current pricing, Best Seller Rank with subcategory breakdowns, buy box winner, review summaries, and search across 9 marketplaces. All requests routed through mobile carrier IPs for maximum reliability. Replaces $30-200/month tools like Jungle Scout and Helium 10 with pay-per-request pricing.

pricing.comparison: Jungle Scout: $49/mo (limited lookups). Helium 10: $29-229/mo. Keepa API: $0.02/product. Outscraper Amazon: $0.01-0.05/product. Our x402 zero-signup micropayments start at $0.005/product with real mobile proxy IPs.

whyMobileProxy: Amazon aggressively blocks datacenter IPs with CAPTCHAs and returns different prices/availability based on IP reputation. Mobile carrier IPs (4G/5G) appear as real shoppers, bypassing bot detection and returning accurate pricing, BSR rankings, and buy box data. Without mobile proxies, Amazon returns CAPTCHA pages or redirects to robot-check.

product.title: string — Product title
product.price: { current: number, currency: string, was: number | null, discount_pct: number | null }
product.bsr: { rank: number, category: string, sub_category_ranks: Array<{ rank, category }> }
product.buy_box: { seller: string, is_amazon: boolean, fulfilled_by: string }
product.availability: string — In Stock / Out of Stock / etc.

limitations: 9 marketplaces supported: US, UK, DE, FR, ES, IT, CA, JP, AU
ASIN must be exactly 10 alphanumeric characters
